titleStmt.title: W. J. Bynus et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2879

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
To his excellency Beriah Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky --

The undersigned citizens of Russellville District Logan County Kentucky respectfully recommend that you appoint Drury W. Poor Esqr. as a Justice of the peace for this district to fill the vacancy occasioned by the death of Alexr. Hull

W J Bynus
E. S.. Stevenson
P N Bradley
R C Bowling
H A Limbaugh
E Stevenson
J R Payne
Henry F. Cornelius
G. W. Norton
B. Alderson
Wm G Wilson
John P. Green
T. A. Frazer
M. McCarty
R T Higgins
J, H, Fuqua
J H Bowden
M R Morton
J. M Perry
James McCallents
N, Long
J. W. Ryan
Henry Walker
Peter E Walker
W T Courts
P. S. Roberts
F. H. Inman
Jas. J. Price
D A Kemp

If it suits the Govenor to make the appointment in accordance with the above petition he will please direct the commission to J. C. Wilkins at Bowlinggreen Ky, as there is no mail running to this point --

Logan co.
J P.
Rich T. Higgins
appointed
